title: MGM Resorts International (MGM) Shares Cross Below 200 DMA - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Tuesday, shares of MGM Resorts International (Symbol: MGM) crossed below their 200 day moving average of $27.23, changing hands as low as $26.91 per share. MGM Resorts International shares are currently trading off about 3.6% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of MGM shares, versus its 200 day moving average:     Looking at the chart above, MGM's low point in its 52 week range is $21.615 per share, with $31.68 as the 52 week high point - that compares with a last trade of $27.12.
